About Me

My name's not actually speen, that's just a funny nickname. I'm Spencer Tenney, feel free to call me Spence. I'm a student studying computer science and graphic design at Marietta College, in Ohio. I love making things digitally, both art and software. See some of my projects below!

Some of the tech stuff I've worked on...

  • a barnsley fern rendered in Python's matplotlib
  • read about a keyboard I built
  • emoji stats, a discord bot that tracks emoji use
  • using tricks to take colored pictures with a gameboy camera

Some of my art...

  • a redesigned of one of my favorite album covers
  • making a poster of Shel Silverstein
  • making a portrait of one of my favorite musicians out of text
